means: （体育运动、比赛等前）做准备活动

sentence.Network_en: A short walk will limber up the legs.
sentence.Network_cn: 散一小会儿步能放松腿部。

sentence.Network_en: By now he was perspiring and felt warmer and more limber.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身上见了点汗,暖和,也轻松了一些.
在游泳前活动一下身子吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... liken vt. 把…比作 limber adj. 可塑的，柔软的 limerick n. 打油诗.
车字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 车辙〖 rut〗 车轴〖 axletree;limber;axle〗 车子〖 vehicle〗.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... lima 利马(秘鲁首都) limber （肌肉）松软的，柔软的 limbo 不稳定，中间状态.
石油词汇英语翻译(L)--石油百科 ... limber string 柔性钻具 limber 易弯曲的 limbic system 边缘系统.

list.abs: limber board 污水道盖板limber chain 去污链limber hole 排水孔
婆裟的意思_百度知道 ... 分散;扶疏[ disperse] 舒展[ limber up] 舞[ dancing].
大学英语四级常用词组 ... like any thing 象什么似地；拼命地 limber up 使柔软；柔和一下身体 go beyond the limit 超过限度.
limber chain 去污链limber hole 排水孔limber hole 污水孔
驳运船limber board 污水道盖板limber hole 污水孔

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as an adjective): perhaps from limber in the dialect sense 'cart shaft', with allusion to the to-and-fro motion
Middle English lymour, apparently related to medieval Latin limonarius from limo, limon- 'shaft'

means.word_mean: 1. a two-wheeled horse-drawn vehicle used to pull a field gun or caisson

sentences.sentence: "The violist limbered her wrists before the concert"

means.word_mean: 1. (used of e.g. personality traits) readily adaptable;
2. (used of persons' bodies) capable of moving or bending freely

auth_sentence.content: I had absolutely no idea that goats were that limber.

means.word_mean: (体育运动、比赛等前)做准备活动，做热身运动

sentences.en: The players were limbering up for the game.
sentences.cn: 运动员正在为比赛做预备活动。

sentences.en: The candidates are already limbering up for the election campaign.
sentences.cn: 各候选人已经在为竞选运动热身了。
